item.description:
It looks like nice weather is here to stay! Let's meet after work, take a walk on the beach, and relax by the water. The smell of salt in the air does wonders to help you leave the workday behind.

Let's meet at the picnic tables under the pine trees at West Beach. For those who haven't been here before - drive into Hammonassett, and bear right at the fork - there is a sign for West Beach. Park in the farthest lot on the left, and the pine trees will be in front of you. I will have a sign on a tree as well.

Please email me with any questions. Dogs are welcome, but must be on a leash while on the beach.
item.name: Wednesday Walk on Hammonassett
